String.string: Receive orders from Samael at Velik's Steps.
Take a pegasus to Popolion and speak with Paka. [Speak with {@LinkCreature:63#1009#Adela} at the pegasus platform to go to Popolion.]
Speak with Paka and tell him Samael's information.
Use the teleportal to go to Camp Vigilance.
Look for Brohua at Camp Vigilance. [Use the {@LinkCreature:67#1022#Teleportal} to go to Camp Vigilance.]
Drive back the disturbed constructs around Camp Vigilance.
Go see Centurion Amallen at Camp Retribution.
